subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Rick Peterson is the guy who keeps picking up that phone in the dugout and calling the bullpen. He explains that, yes, he needs another relief pitcher to warm up and, no, he is not kidding.
snippet: Rick Peterson is the guy who keeps picking up that phone in the dugout and calling the bullpen. He explains that, yes, he needs another relief pitcher to warm up and, no, he is not kidding.
